verses.verse: <S%G5119>So<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> flogged <S%G3146>him.<s%>

<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G4120>twisted<s%> <S%G173>thorns<s%> <S%G1537>into<s%> a <S%G4735>crown,<s%> and <S%G2007>put<s%> it <S%G2007>on<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2776>head,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4016>dressed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> in a <S%G4210>purple<s%> <S%G2440>garment.<s%>
<S%G2532>They<s%> kept <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5463>"Hail,<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews!<s%>" <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G4475>kept<s%> <S%G1325>slapping<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1854>out<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1492>"Behold,<s%> I <S%G71>bring<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1854>out<s%> to <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> you may <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> basis for a <S%G156>charge<s%> <S%G1722>against<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> <S%G1854>out,<s%> <S%G5409>wearing<s%> the <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G174>thorns<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4210>purple<s%> <S%G2440>garment.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> Pilate <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1492>"Behold,<s%> the <S%G444>man!<s%>"

<S%G3753>When<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5257>officers<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> they <S%G3004>shouted,<s%> saying, <S%G4717>"Crucify!<s%> <S%G4717>Crucify!<s%>" <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2983>"Take<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2532>yourselves,<s%> and <S%G4717>crucify<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> basis <S%G1063>for<s%> a <S%G156>charge<s%> <S%G1722>against<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>"

The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2249>"We<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> he <S%G3784>ought<s%> to <S%G599>die,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>"
<S%G3753>When<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G3056>saying,<s%> he <S%G5399>was<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G5399>afraid.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4232>Praetorium<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G4159>"Where<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> <S%G1161>from?<s%>" But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G612>answer.<s%>

<S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3756>"Aren't<s%> <S%G2980>you<s%> speaking to <S%G1698>me?<s%> <S%G3756>Don't<s%> <S%G1492>you<s%> know <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G630>release<s%> <S%G4571>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G4717>crucify<s%> <S%G4571>you?<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3756>answered,<s%> "You would <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> at all <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G1700>me,<s%> <S%G1487>unless<s%> <S%G3361>it<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G4671>you<s%> from <S%G509>above.<s%> <S%G1223>Therefore<s%> he <S%G5124>who<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> to <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3173>greater<s%> <S%G266>sin.<s%>"

<S%G1537>At<s%> <S%G5127>this,<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> was seeking <S%G2212>to<s%> <S%G630>release<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> cried <S%G2896>out,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1437>"If<s%> you <S%G630>release<s%> this <S%G5126>man,<s%> you <S%G1488>aren't<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2541>Caesar<s%>'s <S%G5384>friend!<s%> Everyone <S%G3956>who<s%> <S%G4160>makes<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> a <S%G935>king<s%> speaks <S%G483>against<s%> <S%G2541>Caesar!<s%>"

When <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G5126>these<s%> <S%G3056>words,<s%> he <S%G71>brought<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1854>out,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> sat <S%G2523>down<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the judgment <S%G968>seat<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> a <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> "The <S%G3038>Pavement,<s%>" <S%G1161>but<s%> in <S%G1447>Hebrew,<s%> <S%G1042>"Gabbatha.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> it <S%G2258>was<s%> the <S%G3904>Preparation<s%> Day of the <S%G3957>Passover,<s%> <S%G1161>at<s%> <S%G5616>about<s%> the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G1492>"Behold,<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G935>King!<s%>"

<S%G1161>They<s%> cried <S%G2905>out,<s%> "Away <S%G142>with<s%> <S%G846>him!<s%> Away <S%G142>with<s%> <S%G4717>him!<s%> Crucify <S%G4091>him!<s%>" Pilate <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> "Shall I <S%G4717>crucify<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G935>King?<s%>" The chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> "We <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1487>but<s%> <S%G2541>Caesar!<s%>"

<S%G3767>So<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G3860>he<s%> delivered <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> be <S%G4717>crucified.<s%> <S%G1161>So<s%> they <S%G3880>took<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G520>led<s%> him <S%G520>away.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> went <S%G1831>out,<s%> <S%G941>bearing<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4716>cross,<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> "The Place of a <S%G2898>Skull,<s%>" <S%G3739>which<s%> is <S%G3004>called<s%> in <S%G1447>Hebrew,<s%> <S%G1115>"Golgotha,<s%>"

<S%G3699>where<s%> they <S%G4717>crucified<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G243>others,<s%> on <S%G1782>either<s%> side <S%G1782>one,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> in the <S%G3319>middle.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G1125>wrote<s%> a <S%G5102>title<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5087>put<s%> it <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G4716>cross.<s%> <S%G1161>There<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G2424>"JESUS<s%> OF <S%G3480>NAZARETH,<s%> THE <S%G935>KING<s%> OF THE <S%G2453>JEWS.<s%>"

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G5102>title,<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> crucified <S%G4717>was<s%> <S%G1451>near<s%> the <S%G4172>city;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> in <S%G1447>Hebrew,<s%> in <S%G4515>Latin,<s%> and in <S%G1676>Greek.<s%>

The chief <S%G749>priests<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G4091>Pilate,<s%> <S%G3361>"Don't<s%> <S%G1125>write,<s%> <S%G935><s%> 'The King of the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%>' <S%G235>but,<s%> <S%G3754><s%> <S%G1565><s%> 'he <S%G2036>said,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews.<s%>'"
<S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G3739>"What<s%> I have <S%G1125>written,<s%> I have <S%G1125>written.<s%>"

<S%G3767>Then<s%> the <S%G4757>soldiers,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> they had <S%G4717>crucified<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2440>garments<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G3313>parts,<s%> to <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G4757>soldier<s%> a <S%G3313>part;<s%> and <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G5509>coat.<s%> <S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G5509>coat<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> without <S%G729>seam,<s%> <S%G5307>woven<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G509>top<s%> <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3650>throughout.<s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> they <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> one <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G4977>"Let<s%>'s <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4977>tear<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> cast <S%G2975>lots<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> to decide <S%G5101>whose<s%> it will <S%G2071>be,<s%>" <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> might be <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> which <S%G3004>says,<s%> "They <S%G1266>parted<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2440>garments<s%> among <S%G1438>them.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1909>For<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2441>cloak<s%> they <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G2819>lots.<s%>" <S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G3303>the<s%> <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> these <S%G5023>things.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> there were <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G3844>by<s%> the <S%G4716>cross<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>'s <S%G79>sister,<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> the wife of <S%G2832>Clopas,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> his <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G25>loved<s%> standing <S%G3936>there,<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G1135>"Woman,<s%> <S%G2400>behold<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G5207>son!<s%>"

<S%G1534>Then<s%> <S%G3004>he<s%> said to the <S%G3101>disciple,<s%> <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3384>mother!<s%>" <S%G2532><s%> <S%G575>From<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G5610>hour,<s%> the <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> his own <S%G2398>home.<s%>

<S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G1492>seeing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> were <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G5055>finished,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> might be <S%G5048>fulfilled,<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> "I am <S%G1372>thirsty.<s%>"

<S%G3767>Now<s%> a <S%G4632>vessel<s%> <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G3690>vinegar<s%> was <S%G2749>set<s%> <S%G1161>there;<s%> so they <S%G4060>put<s%> a <S%G4699>sponge<s%> <S%G4130>full<s%> of the <S%G3690>vinegar<s%> on <S%G5301>hyssop,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4374>held<s%> it at <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4750>mouth.<s%>

<S%G3753>When<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> had <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G3690>vinegar,<s%> he <S%G2036>said,<s%> "It is <S%G5055>finished.<s%>" He <S%G2827>bowed<s%> his <S%G2776>head,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> gave <S%G3860>up<s%> his <S%G4151>spirit.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G1893>because<s%> it <S%G2258>was<s%> the <S%G3904>Preparation<s%> <S%G2443>Day,<s%> so that the <S%G4983>bodies<s%> <S%G3306>wouldn't<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3306>remain<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G4716>cross<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> <S%G1063>(for<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G3173>special<s%> <S%G2250>one<s%>), <S%G2065>asked<s%> of <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4628>legs<s%> might be <S%G2608>broken,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> that they might be taken <S%G142>away.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> the <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2608>broke<s%> the <S%G4628%G99999>legs<s%> of the <S%G4413>first,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> was <S%G4957>crucified<s%> with <S%G846>him;<s%>

<S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and saw <S%G1492>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G2348>dead,<s%> they <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G2608>break<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4628>legs.<s%>

<S%G235>However<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G3572>pierced<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4125>side<s%> with a <S%G3057>spear,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2117>immediately<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> came <S%G1831>out.<s%>

<S%G3588>He<s%> who has <S%G3708>seen<s%> has <S%G3140>testified,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3141>testimony<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G228>true.<s%> <S%G2548>He<s%> <S%G1492>knows<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2548>he<s%> <S%G3004>tells<s%> the <S%G227>truth,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> may <S%G4100>believe.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G1096>happened,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> might be <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> "A <S%G3747>bone<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4937>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> be <S%G4937>broken.<s%>"
